text: Bi rasti ewane ku fileti dikin hene; ewanan male xwe didine xwarine, ji bo ku ewan reya Yezdan li ber merivan bigirin. Idi ewane di nezik da ji disa ewi male xwe bidin, pase we ewa mal sixurandina wane ji bona wan ra bibe kovan pase ewane sernegun ji bibin. U bi rasti ewane bune File hene! Ewane li bal doje da kom bibin
